Facts: A fortune cookie is a crisp cookie usually made from four, sugar, vanilla and sesame seed oil with a piece of paper inside, a "Fortune", on which is an aphorism or a vague prophecy._JA
SeeAllFortune: You can click the fortune cookie image to see all possible fortune!_JA
BeforeConsumingConfirmation: You can change the fortune of the last cookie. Would you like to change it?_JA
LastActionDrawFortune: You opened a fortune cookie! Consume it to open another cookie._JA
LastActionSomeoneDeleted: Sorry, someone already deleted that fortune!_JA
LastActionSuccessUpdate: You consumed a fortune cookie and changed a fortune!_JA
LastActionForgotToUpdate: You forgot to input a new fortune! you may click "Cancel Update" to open another cookie without updating the fortune._JA
LastActionInputFortune: Input the new fortune you want in the text field and click "Update Fortune"_JA
